argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zntos.y | |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) |
| 2 |  | znhash.1 | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_znhash | |- ( N e. NN -> ( # ` B ) = N ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nnnn0 | |- ( N e. NN -> N e. NN0 ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( N e. NN -> ( # ` B ) e. NN0 ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` Y ) e. _V |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 8 |  | #P_hashclb | |- ( B e. _V -> ( B e. Fin <-> ( # ` B ) e. NN0 ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( B e. Fin <-> ( # ` B ) e. NN0 ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_sylibr | |- ( N e. NN -> B e. Fin ) |
